message: Added parcel bundler and updated readme

Merge pull request #3 from arronhunt/master

Update readme && fix example script
add assets and components from example-dapp
add prettier and husky, enforce pre-push check and configure tslint-config-prettier
removed webpack as a dev dependency
replace dynamic import with dependency injection
merged master changes, updated torus package
use minified file without zipping types
Sequence Wallet web and injected connector support
